top_categories.workout_context: Dirty Sheets Gravel Grind rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Dirty Sheets Gravel Grind’s rolling gravel, rural georgia demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing Dirty Sheets Gravel Grind isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Dirty Sheets Gravel Grind’s georgia rolling gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Dirty Sheets Gravel Grind. Make this intensity feel like home.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Dirty Sheets Gravel Grind when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
Dirty Sheets Gravel Grind’s georgia rolling gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Dirty Sheets Gravel Grind — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Dirty Sheets Gravel Grind — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
Every session at Dirty Sheets Gravel Grind intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
Blended sessions combine endurance with intensity spikes — exactly what Dirty Sheets Gravel Grind’s georgia rolling gravel delivers on race day.
The varied gradients at Dirty Sheets Gravel Grind reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Dirty Sheets Gravel Grind’s 75 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Dirty Sheets Gravel Grind requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on georgia rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: rolling gravel, rural georgia, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 75 miles of georgia rolling gravel in Chattahoochee Hills, Georgia.
